column4: hello I have problem with gnome. after opening Computer from Places, nautilus closes and all icons from desktop disapear
I get this in syslog Aug 14 16:20:33 FreshBox kernel: [  424.724509] nautilus[4394]: segfault at 630000 ip b76dff76 sp bfd58070 error 4 in libglib-2.0.so.0.2104.0[b7689000+c3000]
How can I access it after opening nautilus?
isnt ther e a symbol on the top?
okay, then do the same thing that you did before natuilus crashed
thanks a lot, ill have a look
the desktop icons should actually come back when nautilus is restarted
gvfs-backends is already the newest version.
i am not sure, but i think reinstalling this backage should help. i will test it, one second
no, this does not make sense, you would have to install nautilus.
